CPAY Staffing & Recruiting is a dedicated staffing firm based in St. Charles, MO, specializing in connecting the right candidates, with the right job, at the right time. The firm's primary goal is to build strong teams, reduce turnover, enhance profitability, and contribute to building a better world. We offer a wide range of placement services across various roles, including assembly, quality control, machinist, warehouse operations, production leadership, customer service, administrative support, and executive-level management.

Our recruitment services are available on a contract, intern-to-hire, or direct hire basis, providing partner companies with staffing solutions tailored to meet their specific needs. The firm emphasizes quality over quantity, ensuring they provide highly qualified professionals tailored to each client's requirements.  CPAY Staffing & Recruiting is known for its knowledge, professionalism, personal commitment, competitive pricing, and fast turnaround times with the right candidate, at the right time.

company_description:
The Tayler Group is a privately owned Executive Search and Talent Advisory firm with offices in New York, Miami, and London.

We focus exclusively on executive-level and commercially focused roles within our four core markets - Management Consulting and professional services firms, Software Vendors, Industry Disruptors, and the Investor Community.

Our clients are high growth and industry specialized firms, that often do not possess the brand equity to attract top talent by themselves.  We believe in an "extraction-focused" approach to search – we take the time to learn about our clients in detail so that we can tell a compelling story to the market which allows us to provide them with candidates they would not normally be able to reach.    

Below are examples of firms we represent:

•Small, high-growth technology firms with recent investment, who require a specialist to tell their story and support them in expanding their Executive Team. 
•Mid-sized firms looking to hire leaders in line with a revised or fresh strategic direction. 
•Established firms looking to build out a new business area and require innovative leaders to drive growth.

Welcome to Paramount Placement.  We connect exceptional talent with outstanding opportunities.  Our personalized approach, industry expertise, and innovative strategies ensure tailored solutions for clients.  We handle every aspect of the hiring process with professionalism and efficiency.

Driven by a passion to revolutionize the field of recruitment and transform the way clients engage with hiring and talent management services, Paramount Placement has successfully disrupted the industry. CORE is Wisconsin's premier provider of Engineering & Technical Solutions for manufacturers of all sizes and types. 

At CORE, our goal is to simplify the complicated, develop the undeveloped, serve the under-served, and make the impossible possible.

Our Services Include: Temporary & Direct-Hire Technical Staffing, Mechanical Engineering, Drafting & CAD Design, 3D Printing & Prototyping, Digital 2D-3D Drawing translations, Machinery Design, Technical Writing & Documentation, Medical Device Design, Electrical Engineering, PCB Design, HVAC Design, Product Development, Project Life-cycle Management, Digital & Software Development Solutions.

We act with the sense of the tenacity that you would expect from a TOP Engineering Search firm and deliver our Engineering & Design projects to our customers with the precision of a finely tuned engineering job shop. These unique qualities have made us the TOP Engineering Services firm in Wisconsin and beyond.

At CORE, we strive to be your trusted partner by understanding your needs, comparing your needs with our capabilities, navigating the challenges of the current talent supply, and then create a customized solution to solve the problem at hand.

We value our partnerships and pride ourselves on providing our services with honesty and integrity. That means we take great care in deciding who we do business with and what types of projects we take on. We are not afraid to say "No" when we feel that you would be better served elsewhere and will do our best to help you find a specialist that can meet your needs.

At CORE, your wish is our command. We will work tirelessly to complete your requests and promise to treat your priorities with sensitivity and commitment.

company_description:
Recognized by Forbes Magazine as one of America's Best Professional Search Firms, year after year!

Founded in 1982, American Recruiters is a national recruiting firm that partners with organizations that are committed to locating, identifying, and hiring the best available talent. Our mantra, #beBetter, is the definitive, continuously improving standard that we aspire to. This is not only for our recruiters but also for our partner customers and candidates. We are driven "to be the highest quality provider of human capital to our clients." 

American Recruiters represents some of the leading healthcare and industrial organizations in the United States. For more that four decades, our healthcare clients have counted on us to provide exceptional talent in Hospitals, Cancer Centers, Practice Groups, Long Term Care & Assisted Living Facilities, and Pharmaceutical companies. Our PHARMACY team specializes in a number of areas including; RX management and directors in hospitals and long-term care facilities, specialty pharmacies, and infusion, nuclear & mail order / PBM. Our INDUSTRIAL group specialties in Commercial Foodservice Equipment and Supplies, Food Processing Machinery, Consumer Appliances, Medical Equipment, Packaging & Material Handling, Manufacturing, HVAC, Accounting & Finance, IT and more...

Specialties
Healthcare, Pharmacy / Pharmacists, Commercial Foodservice Equipment & Supplies, HVAC, Engineering & Operations, Nurse Leadership, Long Term Care, Skilled Nursing, Healthcare Administration, Medical Laboratory, Surgical Services, Emergency Medicine, Marketing & Product Management, and Technical Services.

Search Leaders: Tailored Recruitment for Over 20 Years

Based in Minneapolis/St. Paul, Search Leaders has been a pivotal part of the recruitment landscape for over two decades.

Specializing in information technology, engineering, and HR/talent acquisition, our role goes beyond traditional recruiting. We act as strategic partners, deeply engaged in understanding the unique dynamics of these industries and our community. By connecting with top talent daily, we don't just fill positions—we uncover the motivations and aspirations of candidates, identifying exceptional professionals often overlooked by others. This persistence ensures we continue the search long after others have moved on.

Our approach to understanding clients is straightforward yet nuanced. We focus on aligning with your brand and culture, recognizing that successful partnerships are built on subtlety and precision. By investing time to grasp what makes your company unique, we deliver not just a skill match but a true cultural fit.

With a commitment to excellence, we handle every detail—from personal introductions to negotiation—ensuring matches that go beyond expectations. Our goal is to not just meet your needs but to surpass them, fostering seamless integration and lasting contributions to your team.

Let's connect to explore how we can enhance your recruitment efforts with insight and precision.

Our company name came from the desire to treat both clients and candidates to "Red Carpet Service."

What distinguishes Royal Personnel Services from the rest of the competition is our ability to help our clients grow by separating the extraordinary candidates from the ordinary candidates and then providing them to satisfy our client's needs.

company_description:
If you're like most of our clients, your experience with recruiters is probably one of the following:

a) They sent us nobody.
b) The candidates were not close to what we asked for.
c) They sent me a bunch of unemployed job hoppers.
d) I've dealt with many and can't stand working with recruiters.
e) All of the above.

We recruit in the following:

Sales
Executive Recruiting
Account Management 
Customer Success
Marketing 
Operations 

Why are we different?

We've not just recruiters that have only worked in recruiting.  We have worked in Corporate America and understand both of our clients and candidates.

Typically, the best candidates we see are those that you can't find on job boards. Most recruiting firms have the same recruiting tools but we are much different.  Right Choice Resources employees have a large network so the majority of candidates we place are in our network. Therefore, we know they're not just good interviewers because in many cases, we know them personally or know people that do.

We go after the cream of the crop employees who are loved by their bosses and aren't looking to make a move.  Since most of have been top employees, we show them that although they are working a great job, why it makes sense to be open to a conversation.

In addition, we don't take on every client that contacts us.  If it's outside of our expertise or we don't believe we can deliver candidates, we take a polite pass and/or refer it over to another company we recommend.

keywords: staffing, engineering, information technology, employment, employment services, job placement, recruitment agency, job seekers, client solutions, candidate referrals, direct hire, contract positions, temporary staffing, executive search, payroll management, job opportunities, career development, employment solutions, talent acquisition, flexibility, customized staffing, candidate satisfaction, client satisfaction, local expertise, national reach, interview preparation, resume assistance, job search tips, contract to direct, workforce management, job market trends, employee benefits, background checks, employee referrals, onboarding process, temporary employment, career coaching, professional networking, client relationships, tailored employment, job recruitment, career placement, staff augmentation, remote work, job matching, qualifications screening, skills assessment, client partnership, market analysis, job retention, employment guarantees, employment strategies, staffing solutions, engineering staffing, it staffing, administrative staffing, contract-to-hire, payrolling services, competitive wages, health insurance, personalized service, industry expertise, innovative recruitment, government staffing, commercial staffing, workforce solutions, long-term relationships, employee well-being, award-winning service, technology-driven staffing, southeastern united states, diverse client base, project-based staffing, skilled workforce, recruitment technology, staffing & recruiting, professional training & coaching
company_description:
Visium Resources, Inc. was established in 2002 to service the staffing needs of commercial and government organizations throughout Florida and the Southeastern USA, and how it came to be is an interesting story. The Company was founded by a very experienced team of Staffing Industry professionals whose roots in the Temp staffing industry extend all the way back to the 1950's and 60's.

After individually creating, building, and managing their respective Staffing organizations, the two founders ultimately sold their organizations in the late 90's and retired to what they thought would be the "Good Life". Having spent many years serving together as Directors of a national industry Trade Organization they stayed in touch, and when retirement lost its luster, they decided to meld their skills and actively go back into the industry they both knew and loved. From that decision flowed Visium Resources Inc. A new organization that would take advantage of the industries newest technologies for the sake of efficiency, but had at its core, the principle of doing business on a very personal level, Personal, meaning People to People. With that guiding Core Principle, Visium has imbued its staff with the concept that our way of doing business is to be based on the premise that in every business transaction, we are always serving two customers. Customer one is our Client Company, of course, but customer two shall always be our valued Contract Employees. Both Customers are considered a virtual extension of the Visium "Family". Technology Services– Professional Services-  Staffing– Consulting– Solutions

In 2002, Adaptive Solutions Group (ASG) was founded based on the principles of prioritizing people. Our owners, having a long history in the technology services space, had seen an unwelcome shift towards commoditization. Relationships with people suffered as the industry grew. company_description:
Finding work of any kind is hard enough. But, finding the ideal job? Well, that's a fulltime commitment! One that requires considerable focus, time and a strong network stocked with people dedicated to connecting the right opportunities with the right individuals.

This is where ITAC hopes to become part of your long-term solution.

Because at ITAC, we are different. We value relationships over numbers and are dedicated to sticking around for the long-haul rather than the short-term win. It's hard to put into words, but what we do is both beautifully simple and incredibly difficult.

That's where the work part comes into the picture.

We make a point to ask all the right questions, and also take the time to really listen to the answers. These insights matter, in fact they are the lifeblood of ITAC as they allow us to carefully evaluate each job and every candidate to facilitate the best possible matches. For us it's about connecting great people with great companies…large or small…and seeing those partnerships thrive. After all, we are not your common recruiting company. At ITAC we go far beyond the common as we seek to deliver the extraordinary.

We currently offer a variety of placement options including, temporary, contract staffing, contract-to-hire and direct hire options. With 5 offices across the southeast and a network spanning the entire country, we are well-equipped to help professionals and companies find the right placements from the front desk to the corner office! (No hand trucks, back-braces or forklifts though!)

Whether you choose to apply or just leave your information, we look forward to staying connected with you. Join here: http://bit.ly/1jZycqL

company_description:
MedCare Staffing is a locum tenens firm specializing in medical staffing/recruiting company located outside of Atlanta in Flowery Branch, Georgia. We serve Federal/Commercial facilities with Physicians, Nurse Practitioner, and Physician Assistants in all specialties. Above all, we are a client-centric company helping to staff throughout the US, even recently expanding into the Telehealth field.	
At MCS, we understand the concerns of both our large, multi-campus healthcare partners and our small, business/medical practice partners. Our focused and experienced employees work as a cohesive team, not as self-servers who are primarily focused on their needs instead of the clients' needs.
MedCare Staffing, Inc. was formed with the purpose of becoming a solution for the shortage of physicians, NP's, and PA's across the nation. We truly enjoy the client relationship, and we aspire to be the first line of defense for clients facing any staffing decision. Everything we do is customized and tailored around the clients' needs and goals. We treat every client as if it is the only client.

Direct-Hire Placement
Legal Search Solutions excels in recruiting, screening, and placing legal and corporate professionals at all levels. We identify new candidates through a number of sources: traditional recruiting, a comprehensive database, client and candidate referrals, and targeted advertising. 

Temp to Hire Placement

company_description:
ABOUT MBS:
Management Business Solutions, Inc. (MBS) finds the right talent to help you meet your staffing needs. MBS is a recruiting firm founded in 2006 to provide practical, cost-effective, and customized employment solutions to local and nationwide clients alike. Our intentionally designed process allows us to find the right candidate for each position. Our focus area for staffing deliverables ranges from office clerical to supervisory and management roles up to the C-Suite. Our service deliverables include temporary, temporary-to-hire, contingency placement, executive
recruitment, and retainer solutions. 
With a historic and strong focus on identifying and representing diverse talents, MBS staff has over 75 years of combined experience in recruiting, staffing, interviewing, and sourcing – all key components in designing customized staffing solutions to meet our clients' needs. MBS recruiters take the extra steps to gain insights into our client's organization, culture, and employment methodologies – to develop a tailored, rigorous, and systematic process to meet our clients' needs on time and on budget. 

WHY WORK WITH MBS:
Our experience in representing diverse talents is in our corporate DNA; we take the extra step to identify an inclusive pool of candidates for our client openings and increase diverse candidate representations. 

Our results speak for themselves:
•	2022: 49% of our placements were diverse, and 72% of our hires were female
•	2021: 51% of our placements were diverse, and 73% of our hires were female
•	2020: 44% of our placements were diverse, and 78% of our hires were female
•	2019: 30% of our placements were diverse, and 71% of our hires were female

Management Business Solutions designs customized solutions for unique opportunities to meet the specialized needs of our client's staffing and recruiting requirements. 

Visit our website to Learn more!

company_description:
Regen is not "just another" recruitment agency. We are a forward-thinking recruitment business that challenges the traditional methods of the industry. 

Priding ourselves on our ability to build relationships, we are not sales robots bound by KPIs trying to fit the square peg in the round hole. We are people who work with people and have a little fun on the way.

Our unrivalled knowledge and experience will help you find the right calibre of person at every level. Specialising in the Property Services, Construction and Facilities Management sectors, we work with our clients and candidates to ensure every goal is met. Regen partners with the industry's leading contractors on a national and regional basis as well as numerous local authorities and housing associations across the country.

We pride ourselves in providing high-quality, unparalleled customer service to both clients and candidates. Every consultant is dedicated to building long lasting and trusted relationships with our clients and candidates, allowing us to become a genuine recruitment partner. Recruitment is the business of ‘people' and at Regen, we put people first.

Regen likes to challenge the status quo. We have a real passion for quality and making a difference. 
Recruitment has always had a stigma attached to it and we want to change that. We are not claiming to be reinventing the wheel, but things do not have to be done in the same way they have always been. At Regen we want to bring our personality as well as experience to the table. We also want to be able to give a little back, find out more at Regen Support - https://regensolutions.co.uk/regen-support/

company_description:
Established in 2009, Pure Staff proudly serves the UK with recruitment services for both temporary and permanent requirements. We are committed to connecting talent with opportunity, meeting the specific needs of each client and candidate.

We cater to a diverse range of sectors, including:
- Driving
- Warehouse & Distribution
- Industrial & Manufacturing
- Food & Drink Processing / Packaging
- Fast Moving Consumer Goods (Specialist Division)
- Commercial

All clients are provided with a 24-hour contact number, where they can reach their dedicated consultant personally.

With our strategically located offices in Birmingham, Worcester and Wolverhampton, we are poised to serve clients anywhere in the United Kingdom. Each week, we serve hundreds of businesses, from small enterprises to Blue Chip organisations.

Pure Staff is also proud to hold prestigious certifications and memberships with the Recruitment Employment Confederation (REC), The Association of Labour Providers (ALP), ISO:9001, UKAS, The GLAA (Licence No# PURE0003), and Sedex.

Beyond our business commitments, we passionately believe in giving back to the community. Since our inception, we have been actively involved in charitable giving, working diligently to raise money for a variety of charities across the UK. At Pure Staff, we're not just providing recruitment services; we're making a difference. 

If you are looking for a recruitment service that is tailored to your needs, please don't hesitate to contact us for more information. We are always happy to help. 

We also have a mobile app available on both the Apple Store and Google Play Store to help candidates find vacancies and help end hirers to complete inductions quickly and easily.

Visit our website to learn more: www.purestaff.co.uk

company_description:
The Three Counties' Most Trusted Recruitment Agency 

Established in 1980, Hewett Recruitment is an award-winning multi-disciplined business covering Worcestershire, Herefordshire, and Gloucestershire. With extensive experience under our belt, Hewett offer tailored recruitment solutions and unique value-added services across our specialist sectors, including IT, Engineering, Commercial, Finance, Industrial, and Executive Search & Selection.

As a B Corp Certified business, we are all about doing business for good. Our ethical compass guides us, making sure our actions have a positive impact on people and the planet. We invest in our local community and are determined to provide services that stand the test of time, whilst also nurturing the talents of the next generation.

When it comes to our recruitment team, they are no ordinary bunch. Each of our Consultants are professionally trained and hold certifications from the Recruitment and Employment Confederation (REC). Plus, we're big on continuous growth – our team receive ongoing training, both in house and externally to ensure they remain at the top of their game.

Hewett Recruitment is a values-led business and we have built a reputation around really looking after every individual. It's in our DNA to customise our approach to fit each Client's unique needs. Our team of skilled Consultants always goes the extra mile, which is evidenced by our 'excellent' Trustpilot rating. We are not just keeping up with industry standards – we're setting them.

company_description:
Ultimate Banking was born from the desire of our two Directors to provide a service that they felt was missing from the recruitment market place. Our aim was, and remains, to work solely with a select group of niche mortgage and personal loan lenders and directly associated businesses. We recruit people that not only understand this highly specialised market but who also hold the same values as our customer-focussed clients. Our clients manually underwrite loans rather than 'tick box' lending and this area of financial services is vital to a large proportion of people seeking mortgages and personal loans, without them many would struggle to find a mortgage at all, much less a competitively priced one. 

We are truly passionate about this market and that is why we do not operate in any other sectors: we love what we do. Many things have changed since 2008 but one thing certainly hasn't and that is our commitment to both our candidates and our clients - we do not pretend to be experts in everything - we are specialist in the mortgage market - if we can't do something we will say so. Much like our clients, we are not a 'computer says no' agency.  Despite technology overrunning the workplace we believe recruitment (much like lending), at its heart, is still about people and relationships. It's good to talk and that makes us pretty unique we think.

To see the full range of our services please visit our website.

company_description:
Established in 2000 our focus has always been on people and quality.

To put it simply, we find the best managers, tradies & labourers for London's most prestigious high-end residential & commercial fit-out projects.

We might be known for our huge network of Aussie Kiwis, our awesome team in the office or even our onsite CSCS test centre, but we know it's our way of building genuine, long-lasting partnerships with our clients and candidates that makes people stick with us. We make the time to really understand your needs and don't make promises we can't keep!

Background

We hit the ground running when our founding partners set out to fill a seemingly gaping hole in the employment market. Both involved in London's construction industry, as a builder and a civil engineer, they recognised the need for a consistent supply of quality, qualified construction professionals to the industry.

Instantly welcomed by construction companies willing to pay the right money to employ highly skilled, reliable staff, we quickly became recognised as one of Greater London's most respected construction recruitment firms.

International Reach

And our network isn't only restricted to the UK! Having placed skilled tradesmen as far afield as Dubai, Monaco, Bahrain and Alaska (and of course Australia and New Zealand), we've proved time and time again that quality outperforms quantity every time and by doing so, have gained the trust of some of the building industry's top contractors.

company_description:
DMA Recruitment is a firm with one aim: to link the right people to the right roles … and the best candidates with the best companies.

Our years of experience in the service-led industries arm us with both the knowledge and the expertise necessary to ensure that our clients – whether companies looking for new recruits or candidates looking for the right employer – will always find their fit.

Our team of mature consultants are proactive and understanding. That means that we are impatient to get results – but also take the time to get to know you and your needs. If recruitment is an art, then we're only happy when we've put together exactly the right picture – for us, "nearly" is never enough.

Founded more than fifteen years ago by our Managing Director, Charlie Beaumont, DMA has always placed a premium on honesty. We are frank with candidates and clients alike – because we believe that integrity is important, and makes recruitment easier and always more successful in the long run.

Indeed, we strive to conform to the highest standards of service in every way. From great communication to focusing on achieving the best fits possible, we work hard to ensure that our services are not just of the highest quality, but the best value, too.

Our business is built on relationships. We manage a large network of candidates and clients to the benefit of everyone we work with … and maintain open, transparent communication with candidates, Directors and internal teams alike. Recruitment is at its best when everyone – from applicant to HR – is working in tandem.

We are our clients' representatives, and in every case, we put our – and therefore their – best foot forward. Recruitment is about building for the future; working with DMA will mean you put in place the strongest foundations possible.

Why not contact us today to discuss your requirements – and see how we can help?

company_description:
Established in 2008 MET Recruitment are a local independent recruiter based in the heart of Dudley and our ethos is really about local people and local companies, we are very service driven and pride ourselves on offering a service that is unrivalled by many of our larger competitors. What makes us different from other recruitment agencies in the area is that we are not focused on sales but on delivering the best possible service to both our clients and our candidates. Ensuring we find the right match for client and candidate, MET Recruitment very much turns on repeat business from happy customers!

We have two dedicated divisions – Industrial and Commercial – both of which provide recruitment solutions to companies of all sizes throughout the whole of the UK looking for temporary, temp-perm and permanent staff. Our management team has over 50 years combined recruitment experience and our specialist Recruitment Divisions are all managed by Recruitment Consultants with direct experience within that sector.

Our services include:

•	CV generation to full recruitment
•	Search & selection
•	Advertising
•	In-person interviews
•	Skill testing & evaluation
•	Job offers
•	Reference checks
•	Screening

All personnel supplied are fully equipped with Job Descriptions, Address Details, PPE, Health & Safety Information, Time Sheets and will provide Proof of ID. Our Commercial Consultants check in all personnel and provide 24-hour, 7 days a week, 365 days per year support.

Our candidate database includes the following key areas:

Commercial

•	Accounting and Finance
•	Payroll
•	Reception / Front of House 
•	Sales & Marketing 
•	Customer Service
•	Administration
•	Human Resources 
•	Technical Posts 

Industrial

•	Forklift Driving
•	Warehouse/Machine Operatives
•	Assembling
•	Picking/Packing
•	Supervisory Roles
•	Press Operatives/Welders/Powder Coaters
•	Cleaners
•	Quality Inspectors
•	Skilled Machinist

company_description:
We are RedLaw, legal recruitment specialists. We do two things: we help lawyers and legal professionals to find the right law firms and law firms to find the right lawyers and legal professionals. Where we seek to be different is in the relationships that we build and where these lead. Whether you're a lawyer, a law firm or a future member of our own team, we believe that every successful relationship at every touch point should be built on trust: the genuine, meaningful, mutually rewarding kind. 

Established in 2009, our team of highly accomplished recruiters facilitate some of the highest profile partner and team moves in the UK, U.S and internationally. These strategic hires make substantial contributions to our client's growth and profitability, enabling law firms to strategically change their businesses - diversify client service offerings, extending or building reputation, creating new practice areas and leading firms to be ranked in legal directories. 

RedLaw has earned an unrivalled reputation as one of the leading, results-driven independently owned London boutique recruiters and is the only recruitment agency in London truly servicing all needs of a law firm. We place legal professionals across all areas and at all levels of private practice.

What we do:
-	Partners and team moves
-	Associates
-	Business Services; to include HR, Recruitment, L&D, Marketing, BD, Risk & Compliance, Tech, Finance
-	Paralegals
-	Law firm mergers

Day Rate:

company_description:
Building trust 

Do one thing and do it well. That's us. In our case, it's recruitment for the construction, building services and Traffic Management sectors. That's trades and labour, mechanical & electrical, construction professionals and all levels of traffic management operatives including foreman and managerial staff.

Contract, permanent or temporary. Hourly paid or boardroom appointments. All backed by skilled and semi-skilled specialist divisions, each managed by a sector specialist. 

What does this mean? Whether you're a blue-chip or start-up, we won't waste your time. We'll send you people we've checked, vetted and interviewed. Square pegs and round holes aren't us.

If you're looking for work, you'll get one-to-one treatment and a thorough getting-to-know-you process. You'll enjoy salary benchmarking, CV checking and interview prep. And a choice of high-quality opportunities. 

Our Head Office is based in Birmingham with regional offices in Manchester and Leeds, allowing us to operate on a national basis and are building a reputation as the no-nonsense, ethical and trustworthy option in construction recruitment.

company_description:
Welcome to KMC International Resources Ltd!

KMC International Resources is an independent Recruitment Consultancy established in 2010, Specialising in the recruitment of Construction and Engineering professionals across the Construction, Civil Engineering and Oil & Gas Sectors.
 
Our intention is to create a global recruitment brand that offers our clients a significant value added service due to our passion and enthusiasm for providing the highest standard of customer care, delivery and value.
 
We provide staffing solutions across the UK / Europe / SA / Middle East / America, South America and Asia.

At KMC we have the ability to provide bespoke solutions to both our clients and candidates.
 

Since our initial set up in 2010 we have come a long way. We are now on the PSL's of numerous major EPCs and consultancies operating worldwide.
 
The purpose of setting up KMC was to offer an improved and more personal service to both clients and candidates. We know how difficult and time consuming it is to acquire the right talent for your company, that's where we come in.
 
Being Independently owned allows us to be completely flexible to the needs of both our clients and candidates and our approach to recruitment.
 
When we partner with you we learn as much as we can about your hiring needs and the needs of your organisation so that we are fully informed on who we are representing and do so in the best possible manner.
 
We aim to act as an extension of your business and in doing so we intend to represent you in the way in which you represent yourselves.

company_description:
Better Placed is undoubtedly one of the UK's leading, Employee Owned Recruitment specialists! There is a reason why we are one of the Sunday Times Top 10 small companies to work for and it is undeniably down to our people! We are a values driven consultancy specialising in both Permanent and Interim recruitment across Digital, E-Commerce, Marketing, Sales and Tech for some of the UK's most sought after employers. Housing some very well networked and experienced recruiters we are always "better placed" to find talent for clients that range from cool start-ups to some of the UK's biggest brands!

Our thriving offices are located in Leeds, Manchester and London and our people are renowned for offering first class, insightful and collaborative recruitment campaigns with a level of care that is often hard to find in our industry! We are fearless in the face of a challenge and pride ourselves on our expertise in the industries we specialise in. We take pride in the fact that we're consultative not "salesy" and you will see a genuine passion and desire to do the best for our clients that keeps them coming back time and again!

What makes us different? At Better Placed, we believe in building relationships that stand the test of time. All good relationships are rooted in honesty, trust and empathy and we truly take pride in putting in the effort to get to know you, going beyond superficial online relationships to really understand what makes you tick and build the foundations of a long term relationship. It's this deeper insight, coupled with our strong networks and high standards of candidate and client care that really make us stand out in an increasingly digital and transactional world. By talking, listening and caring we are able to satisfy our promise of matching people to organisations, not just CVs to jobs.

company_description:
OUR BUSINESS IS WORKING ............. 

Many of our clients call us on a regular to discuss a number of different scenarios. We undertake market analysis on many job roles to ensure that our pay and charge rates are as competitive as possible. 
We like to keep our clients briefed on any legislation changes or any news item that may be relevant to their business but whatever your reason for calling is, we want your experience to be a good one. Our dedicated teams are fully equipped and experienced to give you sound advice. 

When placing your vacancy with us, you can expect the following:
• One of our team will take full job specification.
• Your vacancy will be compliantly advertised on our website, job boards and local media.
• We will keep you updated at every stage of the recruitment process.
• All applications will be pre-screened to ensure that you only see suitably qualified candidates.

We will not dictate the recruitment process. We work with you to ensure that our processes wrap around yours. If you are short on meeting rooms, we would be more than happy for you to use one of our air conditioned rooms for your interviews. 
We make a great cuppa and have been known to have a box of biscuits (or two) in the cupboard. For those clients that require it, we offer a 24 hour a day service, 7 days a week to ensure that we are on hand to cover any eventualities.

WESolutions specialise in project management of mass volume recruitment, with projects ranging from 5 to 50+ applicants. We do this by either initiating international projects, or taking complete control of your HR and recruitment functions and offering our RPO service.

Our team's modus operandi is and always will be to deliver a service with integrity and transparency that is beneficial not only to our client's but also to our candidate's.
International healthcare professionals provide an opportunity to fill a large number of vacancies within a wide range of specialities, whilst still being a cost effective solution – allowing our clients to use economies of scale to help solve their workforce issues. 

This is a process that warrants a dedicated and proactive approach, ensuring you have the best possible pool of talent to choose from. With a greater understanding of the current market and a large network reach, we are able to recruit from most of Europe, Philippines, India, Australia and New Zealand.

We recruit recruiters - WHAT?  Yes, that's what we do, we are a recruiting agency that actually recruits staff for the staffing agencies that we supply.  That's a tongue twister and something that's hard to wrap your head around, but if you are in our business, you'll get it!!!  

Where do we do this?  North America and the UK.

We work across all industry sectors and we'd love nothing more than to support you with your search.  Our team are all from the staffing industry themselves and our leaders, are veterans (yes, it's sorta sad) from the industry.  

Who cares? Well you should, because if you are a candidate on the hunt for your new challenging position it means that our team knows what it is that you do, the challenges, the highs and the lows, and all that goes in a day's work.

If you are a client - then you really should care as we've likely faced the same hurdles that you have on a daily basis, we've had the t-shirt, and the good news is we STILL love our industry!  

We believe we can really add value whether candidate or client call us today or reach out to our team.

Place was born out of the desire to offer a more personable and respectful recruitment experience in and around architecture. We are passionate about people and the built environment, and we offer unparalleled industry knowledge and contacts built up over two decades. Our service is thorough, informative and insightful.

Founded with a passion for architecture and design and an eye for exceptional talent, we recruit high-calibre Individuals for world-renowned architectural practices, developers, interior designers, communications & PR, cultural institutions, and tech companies. Applying a unique search and selection technique, Place's reach includes a wealth of high-profile industry contacts. Commitment and knowledge are what makes us market leaders.

Our success is testament to our love of building long-term, friendly relationships and enduring collaborations. We believe that the best relationships are always built on a foundation of integrity and trust. This is the simple essence of our business, one that has stood us in good stead over two decades.

Identifying the best people is an art, honed by Place over many years. There's no formula to successful recruitment; it stems from a genuine investment in getting to know people, businesses and cultures. We fully immerse ourselves in this process and believe this is what sets us apart.

Fundamental to Place's service is the belief that recruitment should be enjoyable and illuminating. We're passionate about our offering, and we know that what lies at the heart of every successful working relationship is an element of joy.

We place top talent into a wide range of positions including roles in Civil, Structural, Geotechnical and Water Engineering, Town Planning, Architecture, Sustainable Development, Ecology, EIA Acoustics and Air Quality.

company_description:
Independent Recruitment Agency supplying Permanent and Temporary staff to a wide range of industries. We recruit professionally for Construction, Industrial, Retail, Commercial and Warehouse/Distribution from Senior Management down to General Operatives.

Clients
Recruitment Solutions are fully committed to providing the highest standard of service in every area of our business, from reference checks and thorough interviews to invoicing and payroll. All of our contractors will be paid weekly and on time ensuring a loyal, motivated workforce. Timesheets, purchase orders and debt control will be professionally managed through our experienced back office team.

We are constantly monitoring the ever changing legislation in the Recruitment Industry. All candidates must provide legitimate Identification before commencing employment.

We can reduce your labour costs by supplying the personnel you need only when you need it. As your requirements can change daily, our minimum order is one operative for one day. Alternatively we can supply an entire workforce for an unlimited period.

We will take the time to advertise, interview and reference check employees. The costs of PAYE, Employers National Insurance, Holiday Pay and Statutory Sick Pay will be incorporated into our competitive hourly charge rate hence becoming your one stop "Recruitment Solution"​.

Candidates
Whilst employed by Recruitment Solutions, we provide:

Competitive rates of pay, paid on time into your account or by cheque, weekly by our experienced payroll team. 
Assistance with PAYE tax issues, CSCS qualifications and UTR/CIS registration. 
An extensive payslip, clearly explaining all earnings and deductions is issued weekly. 
Our Health & Safety policy. We are keen to ensure the welfare of employees and will provide Personal Protective Equipment where necessary. 
An extensive job search in order to place candidates in employment suited to them.

company_description:
At Pharmaseekers, we have spent the last 20 years providing top grade locum Pharmacists, Dispensers and Technicians to pharmacy related businesses nationwide. 

We pride ourselves on being able to identify and meet the everchanging needs of our locums, customers and the marketplace overall.

We offer a flexible, supportive and responsive service which we believe leads to positive, long-term relationships – this is proven by the fact that many of our locums & customers have used our service consistently for many years.
We recognise that online systems provide efficiency for our locums and customers needing quick access to manage their bookings. To meet these needs, we have a bespoke system we've built and constantly adapt, solely with our users in mind. Our user-friendly system is accessible online for all users on an array of mobile and computer-based devices.

Whilst also recognising the importance of technology, we also believe it's vital not to lose our personal touch which is integral to our brand. We are always available to answer calls or emails and encourage all our service users to keep in touch with us directly. We believe that this builds a unique rapport and knowledge of our users' needs which allows us to deliver to them, a personalised service which best suits them.

Our aim is simple; to find our customers the locums they need & giving our locums access to the work they want.

For every pharmacy, there is the perfect locum

company_description:
Nationwide Recruitment is a leading specialist Construction Employment agency for the built environment. We supply temporary construction workers from recruitment centres located in London and throughout the UK.

The agency supply of temporary workers to the built environment has been an integral part of Construction process for many years. In the past 5 years there has been a complete review by the Government how the Construction Industry employs temporary workers. The legislation, compliance and requirements of the Governing bodies and European Union demand that certain procedures are legally required to employ temporary workers.

At Nationwide Recruitment we make it our duty to employ workers fairly and within the guidance of the legislation.

The build process is unrecognisable from 10 years ago. The days of the "Chippie" "Spread" and "Spark" are long over. The construction sector is a sophisticated industry. With changes in building design, materials and equipment the construction worker has to be highly skilled.

Why Choose Nationwide Construction Recruitment?
•We have unrivalled experience in the Temporary Employment Industry.
•With 24yrs experience we really understand the "Built Environment Sector" 
•We are a customer service led business - we do not employ sales staff.
•We are a privately owned business which keeps overheads low.
•Our charge rates have the flexibility to be competitive.
•We are commercially aware of our clients financial funding needs
•We have 1st and 2nd tier funding available for our clients accounts
•Our back office Payroll is accredited ISO 9001 
•Clients have an Account Manager for all bookings regardless of location
•We are a people friendly company and are easy to do business with.

If you require further information about our services please do not hesitate to contact us

t. 0845 9011 461

company_description:
Frontline Recruitment is a privately owned business specifically designed to provide Recruitment Solutions right to the frontline of where businesses need people.

Frontline has established itself as a supplier of choice at each of it's operational locations. It is our continued aim & goal that in any business dealings we have, we should strive to leave the recipient with the following feelings, message, signal and experience with Frontline of;

Honesty – Reliability – Quality

This has proven to be the back bone of success for us, don't just believe us though? In 2006 we volunteered and opened our doors to the Recruitment & Employment Confederation (REC) for them to fully audit our processes and procedures to ensure we met the highest standards, if successful we stood to gain the REC's coveted Gold Standard.

The audit scheme – run by the REC, the trade association for the UK's £28 billion+ recruitment industry – is the most comprehensive of it's kind, offering official endorsements to those recruitment agencies that run their businesses lawfully and ethically. Well, we broke all the records and became the 1st recruiter ever to pass the modified assessment with a 100% score, to this day that still stands.

We will continue to improve upon our standards, aims and goals by providing opportunities expanding our network of offices.

For more information please contact me on 01159838633 or email headoffice@frontlinerecruitment.co.uk

www.frontlinerecruitmentco.uk

company_description:
DSR is a recruitment consultancy operating globally providing expertise in finance, SAP and change management.

Since our founding in 2005 as specialists in SAP project staffing, we have shaped our services around our clients' needs. As companies increasingly sought to standardise their SAP-based business processes to optimise profitability and performance, we extended our remit to cover finance and change management.

We engage closely with clients and candidates to provide world-class service and build enduring business relationships. We use one-to-one meetings and personal contact to enable us to reach a true meeting of minds with everyone we work with.

Knowledge is key to our approach. Our account managers and resourcers are fully trained in all recruitment aspects of finance, SAP and change management, from project lifecycles and  the full suite of SAP modules to finance business processes and the impact of cultural change. They strive to get to know both our clients and candidates: learning what clients do, how they do it and what they want to achieve while developing a rapport with our candidates that lets them build a thorough knowledge of their professional and personal strengths.

We are full members of APSCo (www.apsco.com) and affiliate members of UK & Ireland SAP User Group (www.sapusers.org).

Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/dsrglobal_recruitment/

Workforce solve UK skill shortages across sectors including:

🔹Healthcare
🔹Hospitality
🔹Furniture & Textile Manufacturing
🔹Automotive & Transport Manufacturing
🔹Construction
🔹Engineering

We proudly support the re-emergence of ‘Made in Britain', partnering with firms to help them source quality, skilled staff from all over the UK and Europe. Our business consults at a senior level with some of the UK's best-loved brands and their manufacturing partners to assist them as they experience rapid growth.

The sectors we supply such as Furniture, Textiles, Automotive and Logistics often have deep skill shortages, so we have developed a very effective way of attracting the right calibre of candidates from all over the UK & Europe. This allows us to bridge the talent gap for our clients, facilitating turnover and production growth.

We build long term partnerships, usually on a sole supplier basis, to address the skills gap that so many firms are experiencing across production from upholsterers to sewing machinists, paint sprayers to panel beaters, through to more technical/design roles and senior positions. These are just some of the blue and white-collar positions we can help supply you with.

We are often asked to offer consultancy advice on key business issues such as ways of working, process improvement, driving turnover and managing costs through knowledge gained from years of working at the coal face with our valued clients.

Navigating the world of commission-only sales can be overwhelming for companies and sales agents alike. Statista reports that freelancers will make up 50.9% of the US workforce by 2027, and McKinsey reports that 70-80% of B2B decision-makers prefer remote human interactions. 

Forward-thinking companies are looking to remote global partnerships to save money and take advantage of a rep's local knowledge and network, and more and more sales reps are craving the freelance lifestyle.

For entrepreneurial sales professionals, we provide vetted, lucrative sales opportunities and free tools to run their business more profitably and efficiently.

19 London is an international recruitment agency, specialising in the placement of Personal and Executive Assistants, Legal Professionals, Private Household Staff and International Super Yacht Crew – as well as a variety of other staff – to clients around the world.

Whether you're a Director of a private Family Office, an Estate Manager for a Private Estate, a Partner in a Law firm, a Captain for a Super Yacht, the CEO of a financial services firm, an Agent for well-known entertainment talent, a Personal Assistant acting on behalf of your principals, or a private high net worth individual looking for help running your busy lifestyle, 19 London can provide an extensive range of high calibre candidates, whatever your requirements may be.

Operating across the UK, dedicated in providing unique bespoke services for both our clients and candidates. company_description:
The Recruitment Junction is an award winning recruitment agency in the north-east focussing exclusively on placing people with convictions into paid work. We are a not-for-profit enterprise, with a social heart and on a commercial mission.

We see people with convictions rediscover a sense of purpose through work, becoming role models who drive positive generational impact across their families and their wider communities, as well as substantially reducing reoffending.

The Recruitment Junction has a specialist understanding of what support an ex-offender needs, both in order to access the jobs market and also to sustain employment in the early months. Equally, we recognise the assistance an employer needs to comfortably navigate the process of recruiting people with past convictions, giving the best chance of retaining and benefitting from employees with non-traditional backgrounds.

Our vision is to see people with convictions:
•Rediscover a sense of purpose through work
•Become role models who drive positive generational impact across their families

Our vision is for local employers to:
•See their skills shortages met through our resourceful, resilient workers

Our vision in the North East is to:
•Push back on persistent regional unemployment
•Play our part in getting the economy moving again

Reviva's mission to help businesses fight against crime, fraud & financial crime.

Bentley Lewis is an award winning global executive search and advisory firm offering executive search, executive coaching and assessments. 

Our mission is to enable our clients to execute their business strategies by engaging individuals with the very best available skills, experience and talent. 

Our clients include large listed organisations, high growth companies, PE backed firms, partnerships and regulatory bodies. Bentley Lewis specialises in the financial services, fintech, life science, Industrials, marketing and technology sectors.

company_description:
We make SAP recruitment simple.  

Linksap is a young and dynamic company, and we have a clear and simple aim to provide an unrivalled service level to SAP clients and candidates alike.  

Our team has over 150 years'​ combined experience staffing SAP projects throughout Europe, and we take a mature approach and long-term view to cultivate strong business relationships.

We cannot say we are the biggest, we only strive to be the best.  We match great people to great companies, and it takes qualified experience and true niche expertise to make this happen.  

Since our inception in 2015, we have experienced decent growth to reach 40+ employees, making over 4,000 placements with 450+ different clients, have 350+ SAP professionals working on assignment for us, and assist numerous companies with permanent staffing needs.

We are driven to treat our SAP consultants with care and respect, and truly motivated to understand our clients better at every level, as opposed to a transactional approach employed by so many less qualified competitors.

Link with us, the real SAP experts.

Bamboo Crowd is a recruiting partner that accelerates bold ideas for disruptive startups, agencies, consultancies and ambitious companies building what's next. Bamboo is, after all, stronger than steel!

We are in London & New York.

We partner you with the very best recruiters in the market who build with conviction. Our partners describe us as authentic, curious, collaborative, trusted, and an important part of their team.

Our sector-specialist team recruit across Strategy, Innovation, Research, Design, Product, Engineering, and GTM. We offer Contingent, Retained, and Embedded services.

company_description:
JIE Search enable start-up and scale-up software vendors hire exceptional GTM talent across Europe. 

For software start-ups and scale-ups, the strength of the team is as critical as the product itself. Identifying, qualifying and enabling you to hire exceptional talent and building a team with the right experience and skills is what we do. This is an essential element for you to drive growth and fostering innovation. 

The quality of the candidate shortlist and the management of the process will ultimately, save you interview time and guarantee you hire the candidate with the profile you desire.

At JIE Search we:
•	We implement best practices to identify, attract & hire exceptional talent
•	Save Interview Time
•	Reduce the Time to Hire
•	De-Risk the Recruitment Process. The cost of a poor hire isn't just money. It's the missed opportunities, the affect to team culture and your employer brand.
•	Manage the end-to-end recruitment process enabling our client to concentrate on the business of retaining and generating new revenues

Our service will guarantee:
•	We conduct extensive research to identify exceptional talent in the agreed target sectors and organisations.
•	Delivery of a candidate shortlist within 2 weeks of our briefing.
•	A data-driven and intelligent search solution eliminating the risks within the recruitment process. Saving interview time and time to hire as candidates with the correct competencies and experience, but also the culture and values to succeed will only be interviewed 
•	We market and position the opportunity to the correct candidate audience increasing the ability to attract the best talent.
•	Fact and value-based candidate qualification process

As well as finding the right candidates, we use our data-driven insights to benchmark salaries across Europe, support the creation of the job description and provide guidance on the interview process as we can leverage our deep expertise when hiring for start-up and scale-up software vendors.

19 London is an international recruitment agency, specialising in the placement of Personal and Executive Assistants, Legal Professionals, Private Household Staff and International Super Yacht Crew – as well as a variety of other staff – to clients around the world.

Whether you're a Director of a private Family Office, an Estate Manager for a Private Estate, a Partner in a Law firm, a Captain for a Super Yacht, the CEO of a financial services firm, an Agent for well-known entertainment talent, a Personal Assistant acting on behalf of your principals, or a private high net worth individual looking for help running your busy lifestyle, 19 London can provide an extensive range of high calibre candidates, whatever your requirements may be.

company_description:
OUR MISSION - WE CREATE POSITIVE CHANGE THROUGH PEOPLE

STOIX is a boutique Executive Search and Interim Management consultancy that exists to identify and secure top-tier, purpose and values-led finance and transformation talent for high-growth and rapidly changing businesses.

We are experts in Executive and Board-level finance and transformation appointments, and we deliver the best-in-market talent in a modern, pragmatic and dynamic way. By following a robust but flexible methodology coupled with state-of-the-art recruitment technology we access talent pools and enable conversations that our clients would miss out on otherwise.

Transparency and professionalism are also core features of our approach and we are committed to always providing an exceptional client and candidate experience. 

OUR HISTORY

Whilst 2020 has changed the World forever, STOIX saw huge opportunities for a different brand of modern Search Partner. With the 9 to 5 facing extinction and 5 days in the office an ongoing debate, the ability to work remotely has changed the game for many of us. Top talent can be based anywhere and for some, work whenever. We believe we are well placed to harness this and deploy it to our customers who want to attract the best and ensure they are well placed to recover and grow in a post-pandemic world and beyond. 

OUR NAME

"A Stoic is someone who transforms fear into prudence, pain into transformation, mistakes into initiation, and desire into undertaking." ― Taleb Nassim Nicholas

The name STOIX was influenced by the ancient Greek and Roman philosophy of Stoicism. We believe that in today's fast-paced world, Stoic philosophy is more relevant than ever. We are big on self-development and strive to let the four Stoic virtues of Wisdom, Courage, Temperance, and Justice guide our actions.

We're excited to announce that Scede has acquired People Collective to expand our expertise across the entire talent lifecycle. Talent Acquisition Support: Deploy skilled talent partners to source and hire top quality talent, ensuring hiring goal achievement.

Priding ourselves on our ability to build relationships, we are not sales robots bound by KPIs trying to fit the square peg in the round hole. We are people who work with people and have a little fun on the way.

Our unrivalled knowledge and experience will help you find the right calibre of person at every level. Specialising in the Property Services, Construction and Facilities Management sectors, we work with our clients and candidates to ensure every goal is met. Regen partners with the industry's leading contractors on a national and regional basis as well as numerous local authorities and housing associations across the country.

We pride ourselves in providing high-quality, unparalleled customer service to both clients and candidates. Every consultant is dedicated to building long lasting and trusted relationships with our clients and candidates, allowing us to become a genuine recruitment partner. Recruitment is the business of ‘people' and at Regen, we put people first.

Regen likes to challenge the status quo. We have a real passion for quality and making a difference. 
Recruitment has always had a stigma attached to it and we want to change that. We are not claiming to be reinventing the wheel, but things do not have to be done in the same way they have always been. At Regen we want to bring our personality as well as experience to the table. We also want to be able to give a little back, find out more at Regen Support - https://regensolutions.co.uk/regen-support/

company_description:
At Remoteli, we're rewriting the rules of staffing, recruitment, and outsourcing. Our approach is simple yet ground-breaking, designed to make building and managing a remote team as straightforward as subscribing to your favourite streaming service. Here's why businesses around the world are choosing us:

✅ Comprehensive Team Building: From personal assistants to software developers, build your entire remote team with us.
✅ Cost-Effective Excellence: Access the same calibre of talent as you would in the UK or America, but at a fraction of the cost. It's a win-win: you pay less for better talent, and the talent in Africa earns more than they would locally.
✅ Collaboration Made Easy: Your entire team works together from our dedicated office spaces, ensuring seamless collaboration.
✅ Talent Sourcing & Training: We find and continuously train all talent for you, ensuring your team is always at the cutting edge.
✅ Hassle-Free Management: From equipment to payroll, pensions, and more, we handle all the operational details.
✅ Flexible Subscriptions: Enjoy a flat rate subscription for each team member. Scale up with a click or scale down by cancelling anytime, no strings attached.

Our Vision: To employ 1,000,000 individuals in Africa, creating the continent's largest talent pool. We aim to dismantle geographical barriers, offering top-tier opportunities for businesses and individuals alike. This isn't just about staffing; it's about building a more inclusive, connected future of work where businesses thrive with world-class support.

Ready to Revolutionise Your Business? Subscribe today and be part of this audacious journey towards a boundless, talent-rich future.

🏆 Winner of Global Startup of the Year Award at 2022 Startup Awards National Series UK
🏆 Winner of Rising Star Startup of the Year Award at 2023 Ghana Innovation and Startup Awards

🎖️ISO 9001:2015 Certified

JMC Legal Recruitment is a National Legal Recruitment company. We are Headquartered in Bristol, with offices in Manchester, Edinburgh, Birmingham, New York, as well as a flagship office based in the heart of London's West End, on Regent Street. We're a dynamic business with our sights set high and a growing client base spanning the country. We believe that in any business the most valuable assets are the people – and it's true of JMC, too. We strive for excellence across every touch point of the recruitment process, with expert market knowledge, state of the art software and a passionate team who'll be on hand to help you out of hours, always friendly and with a sense of fun. company_description:
Are you struggling to find the best talent for your advanced manufacturing company?

Do you feel you're settling for average candidates who simply don't fit your vision for growth?

It's time to level up your recruitment game. And we're here to help.

Initially founded in 2006, Kensington Consulting Ltd operated across the UK serving traditional engineering and manufacturing industries. In 2014, Kensington Additive was born, and so was our journey headhunting in the Additive Manufacturing industry. Fast-forward to today, we serve a multitude and variety of companies within the Advanced Manufacturing space.

Our mission is to achieve our client's mission by hiring the world's best talent. To do that, we've pioneered the concept of Root-Cause Recruitment. RCC is a bespoke process that goes beyond simply filling a vacant position. We're committed to identifying your business's problems and finding the talent to solve them. Using the well-established 5Y method, we diagnose the issues needing a recruitment solution. We then build a recruitment strategy that delivers results.

With our niche expertise and deep understanding of your challenges, we will find you the best talent. We don't just rely on surface-level qualifications or resumés. We dig deep and get to know the people behind the documents.

Don't waste any more time with talent that falls short of your expectations. 

Partner with Kensington Additive and experience the true potential of Root-Cause Recruitment. 

Contact us today to learn more about our unique approach and how we can help you build a team that drives your business forward.

Industries we serve are:

Additive Manufacturing
Machine Tools
Calibration & Metrology
Robotics & Automation
Aerospace & Defense 
Automotive
& more.

We leverage our global talent network to not just introduce candidates to tech companies, but to make sure the people we work with in VCs, emerging tech scale-ups and outstanding enterprises are all ambitious people ready to make a difference.
Fast growth VC backed vendors with exciting, disruptive technology and start-up cultures represent over 80% of our clientele - we love working in this space and know exactly how to find the self-starting executives who thrive in these environments. 
By working with the coolest vendors we organically attract a lot of top talent and by methodically and exhaustively searching the entire market for each vacancy brief, we ensure that the most appropriate individual is found. Our high standards, unwavering professionalism and ethical behaviours ensure that over 70% of our revenue is from repeat business.

We Recruit Group (WRG) was created in 2020 and are a leading Built Environment recruitment agency focused on the Residential Sectors. Operating across the UK, dedicated in providing unique bespoke services for both our clients and candidates. We truly value the importance of providing a high quality, consultative service, working in close collaboration with our entire business network.

Our philosophy is simple yet effective, to deliver a service built upon integral values of Quality, Flexibility, Commitment, Honesty and what a lot of people overlook Enjoyment. We enjoy our roles in the recruitment process, and we want you all to share that same journey.
Recognising these qualities in our service gives us confidence to become a genuine recruitment partner to companies of all sizes.

We provide a consultative approach to recruitment, tailored to you, your company and your working environment. Whether you are looking for your next top talent on a temporary or permanent basis, the mobilisation of a full project team or require a managed service solution - we have the knowledge, expertise, and capacity to add the right value to your business.

Our team has over 20 years' experience working exclusively within the construction industry. Due to this wealth of experience you can be confident that when faced with the challenges and complexities of your industry and recruitment campaign we are fully experienced in providing solutions. 
We are experts in our chosen fields which fortunately has allowed us to have forged long standing relationships with the industry's leading businesses and talent.
